trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to and from an object by applying the integer as an index to a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: 将整数与其他对象转换通过将整数作为索引应用于的对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can use the AlternationConverter to bind a property to alternating values.
trans-unit.target: AlternationConverter 可用于将属性绑定到交替值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you do the following: - Create an AlternationConverter and add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你希望项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>具有交替蓝色和浅蓝色背景，您可以执行以下操作:-创建 AlternationConverter 并添加蓝色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>和浅蓝色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>到其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: - In a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>, bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and assign the converter you created to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -在<xref:System.Windows.Style>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>，将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>并分配到所创建的转换器<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> list.
trans-unit.target: 将整数转换中的某个对象为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>列表。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The integer to use to find an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> property.
trans-unit.target: 要用于查找中的某个对象的整数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 绑定目标属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的转换器参数。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要在转换器中使用的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The object that is in the position of o modulo the number of items in .
trans-unit.target: 中的位置的对象 o 取模中的项目。数

trans-unit.source: Converts an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> list to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 将转换中的某个对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>为整数的列表。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The object to find in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> property.
trans-unit.target: 要查找中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 绑定目标属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的转换器参数。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要在转换器中使用的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The index of o if it is in , or –1 if o does not exist in .
trans-unit.target: 索引 o 如果它在<> *1>，或为-1 如果中不存在 o <> *1>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> returns when an integer is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取的对象的列表<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref>返回一个整数传递到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to bind a property to alternating values, the Values property contains the objects that are assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>将属性绑定到交替值，值属性包含分配给属性的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to Values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你希望项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>具有交替蓝色和浅蓝色背景，你添加蓝色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>和浅蓝色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>为值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A list of objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> returns when an integer is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 列表对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref>返回一个整数传递到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>
